title: Gab & Juls: Crisis Point for France?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens take a deep dive on Kylian Mbappe's image rights and all the surroundung drama currently facing the French Football Federation. They also discuss Lionel Messi's contract demands before his last season in Barcelona, some poor excuses for Harry Maguire and a potential move to Serie A for Cristiano Ronaldo.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Drama surrounds Kylian Mbappe and the French Football Federation; Messi's Barcelona contract demands leaked; Harry Maguire's excuses
